content: I have update the RCPA guide at http://fhir.hl7.org.au/fhir/rcpa/index.html. It's structurally complete, though there's ongoing quality work proceeding.
You've certainly been busy - thanks for all the changes.
Can I get hold of the XML for the StructureDefinitions and ImplementationGuide? Are they downloadable from the page(s), or do I have to get them somewhere else?
The structure definitions are linked . e,g, from http://fhir.hl7.org.au/fhir/rcpa/StructureDefinition-ColorectalMap-Observation-1.html see XML link.
fact: all the IGs produced by the IG publisher will have that file, and qa.html, even if it's not linked to from anywhere

I as thinking over how we might address this work going forward, and one thought I had was to first create Questionnaire (and QuestionnaireResponse?) instances first and then map them to DiagnosticReport and create the profiles that way. What do others think of this approach?
maybe. Lloyd is doing some remedial work in Questionnaire that we agreed on in Baltimore, and I'm waiting for that before having another go at a simpler take on the RCPA work
Any detail on that Questionnaire work Lloyd was doing I could look at too?
it's what we talked about in Baltimore - using DataElement from Questionnaire
